attributes.action: Instruct Local Authorities to stop serving school dinners on prison trays.....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want a proper plate and bowl. There is no point improving the quality of the food if it is just slopped onto a plastic tray. How would the prime minister like his pudding sitting on a tray congealing while he eats his main course?
